website_summaries.verdict: An effective, all-in-one cholesterol test kit that doesn't require a lab to get your results.
pros: Only requires a small amount of blood to test an entire lipid panel - six test results in one
Results appear in as little as three minutes
You don't have to send samples to a lab, as the kit includes its own meter
cons: Meter occasionally gives error codes, requiring repeat attempts and a bit more blood for results

customer_reviews.title: 70% Restocking Fee for Device That Gave Inaccurate Results
customer_reviews.text: I paid $325 for a device that was useless to me. I followed all instructions to the letter, even reached out to the seller to confirm, and was not able to produce reliable results. I returned the device and remaining stock of supplies and they charged me a 70% restocking fee. I searched, but nowhere on the description does it indicate how much the restocking fee is. I only had the device for a short period of time, and it was returned in excellent condition. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Way off.
customer_reviews.text: This is so grossly inaccurate I can’t believe it’s allowed to be on the market ... I am a medical professional and was hoping this would be comparable to a lab test , even a little off but it was way off I am very disappointed... i understand they have to have a restocking fee For using the product but they charge 40 percent instead of the standard 20 percent !!!
customer_reviews.author: Hany B.

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: tried testing 4 times got an error code of E2 and E1 each time UPDATE: after 8 tries finally got it to work; the test does require a few drops of blood
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Works well - and one drop of blood does the panel
customer_reviews.text: This works better than the competition - having just one panel-worth of blood means much less sticking, squeezing and pain. Good results. Saves me a LOT of hassle getting tests at a lab!
customer_reviews.author: I C Oxim

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: I tested twice back to back and got vastly different test results. My code chip and strips do not match, so that could be the problem. As it stands this is definitely not reliable enough for it to be of any use. Goodbye $$$
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Williamson

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Product didn't work at all, and when sent back they charged a huge restocking fee. Manufacturer is in South Korea so very difficult to get service. Criminal.
customer_reviews.author: Poeticdinosaur

customer_reviews.title: Expired kits!
customer_reviews.text: The expiration date on the kits are 2021, but they are recognized as expired when inserted into the device! UPDATE: I contacted the seller, and they sent me a new device, and now it is working! They were quick and fast in responding. Don't forget to follow the instruction to get the device working properly, specially the amount of blood used should be exactly 35ul.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: this is the perfect tool, bought it to monitor Cholesterol. Pretty easy to use. currently not using it for glucose.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Missing part, terrible instructions
customer_reviews.text: There was a fundamental missing part that made the device unusable, the instructions were not clear at all. I never used it but got charged a 40% restocking fee!
customer_reviews.author: Glynis Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Read this tip
customer_reviews.text: When you insert the test strip, make sure that the lid is Closed and power is On. I wasted three strips (that's $30 wasted for nothing) because I had kept the lid open when inserting test strips. Other than that, the instructions are pretty clear.
customer_reviews.author: Francesco

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: Want too difficult and accurate except for triglycerides , huge error
customer_reviews.author: Joethesailor

customer_reviews.title: Cannot get it to work
customer_reviews.text: It is stuck on the glucose option. I have not been able to use device. Where can glucose strips be purchased? I gave to my dad who has a different device. He had no better luck.
customer_reviews.author: Angela G.

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and and the numbers seem somewhat accurate
customer_reviews.author: Joon Seung Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best in the market
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use with high accuracy . Recommended to everyone one need to monitor full cholesterol profile.
customer_reviews.author: ali kasem

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Claim on Expiration
customer_reviews.text: Product description is very misleading as it states strips are individually packaged to extend shelf life for 18 months. They were less than half that and the manufacturer said it is only for 8 months.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work. Do not waste your money. I bought this hoping it would save trips to the lab but it was a complete waste of money. It shows error every time and never reads properly.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua S.

product_meta.title: CURO L7 Professional Grade Lipid Blood Cholesterol Test Home Kit - (All-in-One 10ea x Profile Cholesterol Test Strips Included)
product_meta.description:
PLEASE NOTE

 * Because this is an IVD Product (Medical Device), Please ensure to carefully read and follow the user manual and instructions in order to get the most consistent and accurate results


DESCRIPTION

 * The STANDARD LipidoCare system is a cholesterol meter that combines enzymatic methodology and solid-phase technology to measure TC, TG, LDL &Multi. It has been clinically tested by professionals who measured lipid levels on fresh venous whole blood specimens. Due to its portable size, it can be easily stored and moved; the convenience of the test strips has been maximized by enabling storage at room temperature in individual packages
 * 6 test results with just a drop of blood (35µl)
 * Results in 3 minutes with easy countdown timer shown
 * Small enough to be held with one hand and battery-operable for on-site examination
 * Strips are individually packaged to extend shelf-life(18-months)and prevent cross contamination and can be comfortable be stored at room temperature :2- 32 °C / 36-90℉
 * CRMLN Certified to ensure highest quality of results. (Please Note that while every precaution as been taken to ensure the diagnostic ability and accuracy of this product, the product is used outside of the control of the Manufacturer and Distributor and the result may accordinagly be affected by environmental factor and/or user error. Always consult your doctor for confirmation of results)
 * Due to the nature of diagnostic devices test results can show a +- 10% variance for all measured lipid values


CONTENT INCLUDED

 * Blood Cholesterol Testing Kit
 * Digital Meter
 * 10x Multi Cholesterol Strips
 * 10x Lancets (Simple Use without Lancing Pen)
 * Owner's Manual
 * 4x AAA batteries
 * 25 x Ezi Tube 35µl


IMPORTANT

 * If you get a result of ‘Lo’/’HI’ or an unexpected result for any test, test again with new test strip
feature_bullets: ✅PLEASE NOTE: Because this is an IVD Product (Medical Device), please ensure to carefully read and follow the user manual and instructions in order to get the most consistent and accurate results
✅It is recommended to measure after a minimum of 8 to 10 hours of fasting (recommended time is in the morning) after waking up
✅6 test results with just a drop of blood (35µl) : TC, TG, HDL, LDL, LDL/HDL, non-HDL
❗❗ RESTOCKING FEE will be charged for all open box or used returns

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
